attributes.comment:
I am opposed to the significant increases in fees being proposed. As a parent
that has one internationally adopted child and in the process of adopting a second
child, the costs are already a significant burden. The fees for documents like the I-
600, I-600A, N-600, and N-565 already had a significant price increase since
2003, and a second major price increase will add to the financial burden of
international adoption. There are many children in the world that need a loving,
permanent family but Federal, State, and Local governments continue to make the
process more difficult and more expensive. These price increases will continue
reducing the number of prospective parents choosing adoption as a way to create
their family because they simply cannot afford it. Please reconsider these
exceptionally large fee increases as they are not reasonable. Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jason Wutt
